options.name: Chameleon
options.description: You have skill with masking the fact that you are an outsider and can often hide yourself in plain sight. Gain +1 to your stealth skill. When rolling a stealth check as part of a group, your stealth check becomes equal to the highest roll of the group.

options.name: Polyglot
options.description: You pick up the local language quickly and make an effort to adapt to local customs. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. Additionally, gain +2 language points.

options.name: Downtime Action : Vanish
options.description: You take some time and scrub any existence or record of your existence in an area, the size of which is determined by a persuasion check; A check of an 6-9 is midly successful and allows you to convince those within a small area like a village or city block, while a 10 or higher is very successful and expands over a large town. On a perfect check, your effort is wide spread and can expand over a larg city.
